item.description:
NEW WORDPRESS USER GROUP SERIES:
Maximum 12 people reserve your spot now:

With years of WordPress development under our belts, we've decided it's time to share the knowledge!

Although we will all be able to access a sandbox- this will help field questions about setting up wordpress on a local server (Mamp or Wamp) or if you had difficulities related to setting up on a hosted server.

Beer and WordPress: a match made in heaven.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: WordPress@Skytemple: Wordpress Salon
